result.title: How to Improve on USACO Platinum Level?
result.content:
So I have spent the last two USACO contests (Feb. and US Open) in the platinum division, and I can barely manage to get any test cases at all. I think the problem for me is, I don't have proper knowledge of the concepts and data structures that I need to know at this level. So, could anyone point me to or supply me with a list of topics that come up frequently on Platinum contests (and perhaps some simple problems where I can practice and learn these new concepts)?

Thanks! I'm hoping to improve a lot by next year!
